[{"id":"dev-16886","entityId":"86-21892","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Checkout] [Value Voucher][Mini cart]Unable to checkout with Value Voucher in mini cart in "Contact" step if total to be paid is 0"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Iris Gligorea"},{"name":"created","value":"1572620533710"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"16886"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/index
Account emailiris.gligorea@regiondo.com
Supplier ID23776
Novomind Ticket ID64913
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 78.0.3904.87 (Offizieller Build) (64-Bit)

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Book value voucher https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/3rd-value-voucher (Amount =30 euro)
  2. Book Offer from https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/title-of-the-offer-106594 >and use value voucher code (IT94SYNJHHJC)
  3. Go to cart > Proceed to Checkout > in step "Contact" provide the contact information and redeem the Value Voucher in mini cart ( - Total price to be paid is now 0 Euro)

Actual result:

1-When you redeem value voucher from contact page in checkout , Error is displayed : The requested Payment Method is not available.

2- When you redeem value voucher in payment page in checkout : Booking is placed successfully

In some cases the message "please accept the terms and conditions before completing your order' is returned.

  • Please see the attached video*

  • Please note:
    The value voucher can be redeemed from contact page in checkout as long as the total to be paid is > than 0 Euro

Expected result:

1- After redeeming value voucher from contact page in checkout process, order should be successful even if the total price to be paid is 0€

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1572969424005,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-63455","author":"m.nuta","authorFullName":"Minodora Nuta","issueId":"dev-16886","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on Testing with september@autumn.com
Redeeming value voucher on step 2 (Contact) works fine, but when trying to redeem it on step 3 (Payment), nothing happens, and the Total price to be paid remains the same. After filling in the details on step 3, and buying ticket, Success page displays the correct amount, as if the value voucher was redeemed successfully.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1573742996539,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-15988","entityId":"86-18319","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Bundle] Add Gift certificate module for Bundle"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1543843645434"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15988"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://regiondo-demo-account-muenchen.regiondo.fr/packs-promo
Product ID56647
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de
Supplier ID9357
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Step to reproduce:

1- Go to Dashboard » Manage Offers » My Offer Bundles
2- Preview offer ID 56647

Actual result:

We can't buy gift certificate for bundle activities

Expected result:

  • FRONT END

1- Add Gift voucher module to bundle offers

1- A : 1 gift certificate code should be valid of all bundle activities.

1- B :Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :

  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people

2- After buying gift voucher for bundle offer, Customer should be able to redeem his voucher in the normal redeeming link and in POS

2- A : Redeeming voucher template, should propose
Font end :
Back end :

2- B- Show Custom order option if the Redeeming voucher template if bundle offer require one

2- C : if there is no availabilities , show supplier information (Company name , phone , Email address)

Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact %s company name :
%s phone
%s Email address

Wording
EN : Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact the supplier
FR : Malheureusement il n'y a pas de rendez-vous disponible, nous vous invitons de contacter le prestataire
DE : Leider ist kein Termin verfügbar, wir laden Sie ein, sich mit dem anbieter in Verbindung zu setzen:

  • POS

3- Ability to buy Gift voucher in POS

3- A- Display bundle Offer when we select Gift certificate

3- B - Same logic as in Front- end should be applied in POS

  • 1 code valid for all bundle activities.
  • Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :
  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people
  1. Availability of bundle voucher should be taken from Dashboard » Manage Offers » Ticket validity
